directions.step:
1. USE REGULAR PANCAKE MIX OR BUTTERMILK PANCAKE MIX. PREPARE WAFFLES ACCORDING TO INSTRUCTIONS ON CONTAINER.
Recipe Number: D02510
SERVING SIZE: 1 WAFFLE
From the <Army Master Recipe Index File> (actually used today!). Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
